products.title: Origin, Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, basic white - venetian blind the origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in b
products.productdescription: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen. Or instead, off-set pastel greens or yellows for a little extra warmth in a dining room or hallway.

products.title: Origin, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, magnolia - venetian blind the queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamline
products.productdescription: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen. Or for something a little more daring, team with your favourite colour - and with this kind of versatility, it really doesn't matter what it is!

products.title: Origin, Black - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, black - venetian blind don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings
products.productdescription: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour. Or team with soft pastels in the dining room for a truly contemporary look that you won't be able to tear your eyes away from.

products.title: Origin, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, brushed silver - venetian blind the ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the
products.productdescription: The ultra-metallic brushed silver from the origin range is the height of utilitarian style. With a polished, near-matte finish, the blind's aluminium slats are sturdy and hardwearing, and easily controlled using the colour-matched cords that hang from the sides. The beauty of the brushed silver is that it can be used as part of a room's central colour scheme, or incorporated as a simple accent, in the same way as a fixture or fitting might. Utilise as an integral part of an industrial kitchen style, or place among your favourite bolds and brights in the living room or dining room.

A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, their faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with their customers.

products.productdescription: Dark slate in colour, the origin grey is comprised of satin-finish, heavy gauge aluminium slats, high quality pull-cords, and a clear wand tilt, resulting in a streamlined, contemporary blind. Given that the grey shade will match a multitude of hues, this is an obvious choice for those who like to change their dcor often. Go industrial in the kitchen by pairing the grey with worn metals, rustic woods, and slate floor tiles. Complement with dark greens and deep reds to continue the theme, and choose quirky statement pieces as accents, whether in the form of decorative accessories or functional appliances.

products.productdescription: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it.Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents. Your child will be impressed with their new, funky bedroom look, and you can rest satisfied that you have installed a hardwearing, quality blind!

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, absolute white satin - venetian blind silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily
products.productdescription: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility.Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen. Opt for white units and tiling, painting the walls in green, and finish with shiny chrome fittings.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, castle grey satin - venetian blind the ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability
products.productdescription: The ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability, and functionality.Take advantage of the range's suitability to any environment and use it as part of a monochrome bathroom scheme. Go for black and white tiling, a white suite, and black and grey accessories. The sophisticated castle grey satin will fit in perfectly! Throw in the occasional splash of your favourite colour for added depth.

products.title: Ecowood, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, pistachio shell satin - venetian blind the ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind of
products.productdescription: The ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind offers everything a window could need - and more!Use the pistachio shell satin to tone down a brightly coloured wall in a living room or bedroom. This creamy tone will match rich shades such as chocolate browns, plum purples, and burgundy reds. Accentuate with matching cream tones and the occasional splash of muted gold.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, penthouse satin - venetian blind true to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to a
products.productdescription: True to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to achieve. Not anymore!Use the penthouse satin in a contemporary bedroom, where creams, coffees, and golds rule the roost. Add in plenty of plush fabrics to provide a feeling of luxe and comfort, using coffee browns and glistening golds as light accents around the room.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, devon cream satin - venetian blind the flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt t
products.productdescription: The flawless finish of the ecowood in devon cream satin is given by the satin-matt cream paint used to coat the hardwearing faux wood slats. For adjustable light, ventilation, and privacy, simply move and tilt the slats to suit your needs.Insert the devon cream satin into a natural and light decor scheme, furnishing the room with bare and painted wickers, unfinished woods, and organic hessians. Paint the walls in cream or oatmeal and include a large jute rug for added rural flair.

products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chic grey satin - venetian blind the ecowood in chic grey satin is as bold as grey gets, and this dark hue offers an air of moody sophistication. With a polished feel, the slats offer clean lines and ease of use. They can be adjusted quickly and
products.productdescription: The ecowood in chic grey satin is as bold as grey gets, and this dark hue offers an air of moody sophistication. With a polished feel, the slats offer clean lines and ease of use. They can be adjusted quickly and simply to allow in more or less light as needed.Let the chic grey satin take centre stage against a white wall, and accent with a pale lemon yellow, making for the ideal colour scheme for a contemporary kitchen. Keep matching greys to a minimum, keeping the room light and airy with plenty of whites and yellows.

products.title: Ecowood, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, blizzard grey fine grain - venetian blind reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there
products.productdescription: Reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there's the added bonus of moisture-resistance and strong durability.Team the blizzard grey fine grain with a monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary living room. Stick to pure white walls and add in furniture in varying tones of black and grey, throwing in some plush fabrics to counteract the hard lines and colours.

products.metadescription: Ecowood, country fine grain - venetian blind convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resis

This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resistant, making it an ideal choice for a family bathroom or kitchen.Go all-out outdoorsy in your living room by partnering the country fine grain with forest and grass greens and natural, organic browns. Use plenty of wools, hessians, and wickers in the room and add the occasional potted plant to complete the look.

products.title: Ecowood, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: In true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that you can be sure that nothing will distract from this pretty, faux wood blind.Incorporate the chateau fine grain into a romantically styled bathroom, where the tiling is a creamy off-white and the walls are painted in pale vintage pink. Be sure to include vintage, shabby chic finds and opt for antiqued brass fittings.

products.productdescription: With all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-resistant and won't crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens.Influence your kitchen with a soft monochrome scheme, going for brown or soft black worktops similar to the espresso fine grain and creamy off-white units. Include funky retro prints and oddments in the room to inject a little personality.

products.productdescription: With a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you can be sure that it won't warp or crack.Merge the fruitwood fine grain with duck egg blue walls in a traditionally styled living room. Incorporate polished wood furnishings and matching duck egg accessories, adding in a hint of teal for a quick burst of bold colouring.

products.title: Ecowood, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: In a light, orange-toned wood effect, the ecowood in provincial fine grain has a warm and cosy finish, with natural-looking wood grain texturing to give a feeling of true authenticity. Matching accessories, including a pelmet, bottom rail, and control cords, finish the look with ease.For a snug and homely ambience in the dining room, set the provincial fine grain against a mediterranean red, furnishing the room with matching woods in light and medium tones. Accessorise with shades of taupe to give the scheme an extra dimension.

Soften bold reds and deep purples in the dining room or bedroom by placing the alabasta amongst rich, block colour walls, and accenting with matching creams and beiges. Alternatively, give this rich cream a lift with chocolate and mocha shades for a striking and welcoming hallway or landing.

A traditional all-pink colour scheme would benefit from the boldness of the eminence, which could serve as a fantastic starting point for the dcor of a guest or child's bedroom. Or for something even more striking, you might like to try pairing this blind with pale greens, for a floral, outdoorsy ambience.

products.productdescription: With the ability to either hide or stand out according to your preference, this neutral cappuccino shade from the spectrum range brings with it a subtle sophistication and timeless neutrality. Or why not add to a teenager's room to combine fun and sophistication, easily complemented by silvers or whites?

products.title: Spectrum, San Marino - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, san marino - venetian blind the spectrum blind in san marino is a cool grey-blue, and is perfect for ultra-fashionable industrial looks in your home. Given the heavy gauge aluminium that it's made with, this blind has a surprisingly lightweight
products.productdescription: The spectrum blind in san marino is a cool grey-blue, and is perfect for ultra-fashionable industrial looks in your home. Given the heavy gauge aluminium that it's made with, this blind has a surprisingly lightweight feel, and offers a smooth, satin finish and colour-matching trims. This is the ideal window covering for cool grey home office, where it will complement greys, blues, and greens alike. Accent with off-white furniture and cool, industrial metals to create a strong and hard-wearing look.

products.title: Spectrum, London Hue - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, london hue - venetian blind the dark, dusky shade of the spectrum's london hue has a rustic, country feel, yet could easily fit in with a more contemporary style. Satin-finished aluminium slats form the foundation of this blind, and even with su
products.productdescription: The dark, dusky shade of the spectrum's london hue has a rustic, country feel, yet could easily fit in with a more contemporary style. Satin-finished aluminium slats form the foundation of this blind, and even with such an unusual shade, you'll find the pull-cords and rails are perfectly colour-matched.Add depth and atmosphere to a country kitchen with shaker-style units and pretty creams and florals, which will offset the london hue beautifully. Of course, this blind would also make a wonderful window feature in an off-white hallway or utility to add a touch of colour to an otherwise neutral room.

products.title: Spectrum, Lisbon Brown - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, lisbon brown - venetian blind the lisbon brown from the spectrum range is a deep chocolate shade that just oozes chic sophistication. Its smooth satin finish means that light bounces off it without being too bright or overpowering, and the slats
products.productdescription: The lisbon brown from the spectrum range is a deep chocolate shade that just oozes chic sophistication. Its smooth satin finish means that light bounces off it without being too bright or overpowering, and the slats are easily adjustable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Make use of the lisbon brown as part of a gold and neutral themed living room or bedroom, by grouping with soft whites, creamy beiges, and subtle golds, to complete a luxurious and timeless dcor scheme that you'll always feel at home in.

products.title: Spectrum, Tawny Port - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, tawny port - venetian blind the deep red of the spectrum in tawny port can't help but take centre stage, with its smooth satin finish and classic hue. Let the light in, or keep it out, by using the pull-cords to gently adjust the heavy-duty alum
products.productdescription: The deep red of the spectrum in tawny port can't help but take centre stage, with its smooth satin finish and classic hue. Let the light in, or keep it out, by using the pull-cords to gently adjust the heavy-duty aluminium slats as you please. Set the tawny port against rich cream walls for a cosy living room or den, and set the shade apart with soft silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Alternatively, give your hallway or landing a warm, welcoming feel by adding this deep, rich shade.

products.title: Spectrum, Shingle Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, shingle fawn - venetian blind the shingle fawn from the spectrum range brings a creamy brown hue that will remind you off luxury milk chocolate, an effect accentuated by its subtle satin finish. Use it to control the light coming into your home,
products.productdescription: The shingle fawn from the spectrum range brings a creamy brown hue that will remind you off luxury milk chocolate, an effect accentuated by its subtle satin finish. Use it to control the light coming into your home, by adjusting the pull-cord to move the aluminium slats accordingly.Settle the shingle fawn amongst rich creams and pale taupes for a harmonised colour scheme that will work beautifully in any part of the home, and particularly the living room or kitchen. By accenting with dark woods and the occasional gold trim, you can truly bring this colour combination to life.

products.title: Spectrum, Hawaiian Tan - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, hawaiian tan - venetian blind the spectrum in hawaiian tan is comprised of heavy gauge aluminium slats in a deep orange colour, making it both prominent in appearance, and practical and easily workable. Gently tilt the slats using the matching o
products.productdescription: The spectrum in hawaiian tan is comprised of heavy gauge aluminium slats in a deep orange colour, making it both prominent in appearance, and practical and easily workable. Gently tilt the slats using the matching orange pull-cord to allow the light to seep through, or close again to keep it out - it's just that simple! Place the hawaiian tan in a retro, industrial styled kitchen, accented by plenty of metallics and some funky wall art. Or go for a strong, contemporary look in your living room or dining room, surrounding the blind with white walls and the occasional yellow accent.

products.title: Spectrum, Rajah - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, rajah - venetian blind just a touch lighter than a model apricot, the spectrum rajah offers a gentler, more discreet tone, beautifully complemented by the soft satin finish of the sturdy aluminium slats. Take control of the light in your room us
products.productdescription: Just a touch lighter than a model apricot, the spectrum rajah offers a gentler, more discreet tone, beautifully complemented by the soft satin finish of the sturdy aluminium slats. Take control of the light in your room using the colour-matched cords to tilt the slats up and down. Place this durable blind in the dining room, amongst soft chiffon whites and richer peach tones, for a gorgeous romantic dcor scheme that will keep the room's atmosphere light and airy. If you'd rather wake up to this dreamy shade, hang in your master bedroom for a look of elegance and class.

products.title: Spectrum, Rock Blue - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, rock blue - venetian blind rock blue is a soft aqua offering from the spectrum range and, reminiscent of the ocean, this blind is a show-stealer. Don't mistake it for all style and no substance though, because the aluminium slats are high qualit
products.productdescription: Rock blue is a soft aqua offering from the spectrum range and, reminiscent of the ocean, this blind is a show-stealer. Don't mistake it for all style and no substance though, because the aluminium slats are high quality and fully adjustable, making this a practical window covering as well as an attractive one. Give the rock blue a serene white backdrop in the bathroom, to offset it beautifully, or surround with sand colours in the dining room to truly recreate the beach. Ideal for use in the contemporary home, this blind will give you a summery vibe all year round.

products.title: Spectrum, Marsh Land - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, marsh land - venetian blind with a matt satin finish, and an almost black hue, the spectrum in marshland is a high quality aluminium blind with plenty to offer in terms of both style and usability. This is a sturdy, metal blind made up of slats
products.productdescription: With a matt satin finish, and an almost black hue, the spectrum in marshland is a high quality aluminium blind with plenty to offer in terms of both style and usability. This is a sturdy, metal blind made up of slats that are easily adjustable to filter the light in or out. Place the marshland in utility room to create a statement window feature in a usually under-decorated room, or create a striking entrance by using it in the hallway of your home. Use with whites, pastels, or bold brights, all of which will offset the marshland wonderfully.

products.title: Spectrum, Tara - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, tara - venetian blind the tara is a high quality venetian blind from the functional spectrum range, where aluminium slats are easily moved and tilted to allow more or less light in. The pale mint shade, with its soft satin finish, will add peace
products.productdescription: The tara is a high quality venetian blind from the functional spectrum range, where aluminium slats are easily moved and tilted to allow more or less light in. The pale mint shade, with its soft satin finish, will add peace and serenity to any room it's hung in. Place in a contemporary kitchen to temper chocolate browns and dark woods; or add a refreshing look to a neutral hallway or landing, alongside creams or whites. Accent with pretty, modern florals to really bring this blind to life.

products.title: Spectrum, Ronchi - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, ronchi - venetian blind spectrum's ronchi combines orangey yellow with a gloss finish, resulting in a standout blind that is both attention-grabbing and light-catching. Yet if you need a little less light, it's easily blocked out by simply adjus
products.productdescription: Spectrum's ronchi combines orangey yellow with a gloss finish, resulting in a standout blind that is both attention-grabbing and light-catching. Yet if you need a little less light, it's easily blocked out by simply adjusting the slats using the blind's matching cords. Make a statement in the kitchen by teaming the bright ronchi with white walls and matching accents. Or place in the playroom, where easy-to-clean durability is a must and fun, bold colour is almost as crucial - the kids will simply love it.

products.title: Spectrum, Fawn - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, fawn - venetian blind the palest of pale browns, the creamy spectrum fawn is pretty and discreet, making it the perfect neutral shade. Use the adjustable aluminium slats to control the light entering your home, and enjoy how the light bounces su
products.productdescription: The palest of pale browns, the creamy spectrum fawn is pretty and discreet, making it the perfect neutral shade. Use the adjustable aluminium slats to control the light entering your home, and enjoy how the light bounces subtly off the pretty gloss finish. Partner the fawn with mocha browns or rich plums for an amazingly striking colour contrast that will bring warmth and cosiness to your living room or dining room; or use as a complementary neutral in a more functional room such as the utility room or downstairs cloakroom.

products.title: Spectrum, Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, light pearl - venetian blind the pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coord
products.productdescription: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy. Accentuate with sky blues or mid-greens for a cool and calming feel, or with navy blue or plum purple for sophisticated warmth.

products.title: Spectrum, Deep Alabaster - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, deep alabaster - venetian blind the rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye
products.productdescription: The rich cream of the spectrum's deep alabasta is contemporary style at its finest, combining high quality, sturdy aluminium slats with colour-coordinated pull-cords and rails to create a neutral, easy-on-the-eye blind that will stand the test of time. Use the alabasta to complement deep purples or forest greens in the living room, den, or dining room, where it will create a subtle break to rich colours. Or pair with soft mochas and rich creams in a contemporary kitchen or entry hallway.

products.title: Spectrum, Almond - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, almond - venetian blind the creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get
products.productdescription: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use.Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

products.title: Spectrum, Kangaroo - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, kangaroo - venetian blind almost green, but not quite, the spectrum kangaroo is unique shade of grey, with a satin finish and gentle gleam. The slim aluminium slats are controlled easily by the matching pull-cord to allow the outside light in or
products.productdescription: Almost green, but not quite, the spectrum kangaroo is unique shade of grey, with a satin finish and gentle gleam. The slim aluminium slats are controlled easily by the matching pull-cord to allow the outside light in or keep it out.For a different take on classic grey, place the kangaroo in the home office, and offset it with a dazzling white on the walls, and brushed silver accents. This would also make a striking colour scheme in a dining room or kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum, Sapling - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, sapling - venetian blind a rich, tea-coloured beige, the spectrum sapling adds both modesty and depth to any dcor scheme. And with easily adjustable aluminium slats, controlled by colour-coordinated pull-cords, this is a practical choice as wel
products.productdescription: A rich, tea-coloured beige, the spectrum sapling adds both modesty and depth to any dcor scheme. And with easily adjustable aluminium slats, controlled by colour-coordinated pull-cords, this is a practical choice as well as an attractive one. Utilise the soft peachiness of the sapling to complement darker browns or brighter shades of peach, for a harmonised colour scheme in your bedroom or living room, where luxury living and a relaxing atmosphere is your top priority. Accenting with brushed golds or silvers will serve only to further this effect.

products.title: Spectrum, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, dove grey - venetian blind the satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. <br/
products.productdescription: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room. Whichever you go for, you'll love the subtle beauty of this venetian blind.

products.title: Spectrum, Foggy Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, foggy grey - venetian blind the subtle soft cream-grey of the spectrum foggy grey is sweet and discreet, and everything in between. Colour-matched pull-cords and top and bottom rails help to create a streamlined look, so that you can enjoy this
products.productdescription: The subtle soft cream-grey of the spectrum foggy grey is sweet and discreet, and everything in between. Colour-matched pull-cords and top and bottom rails help to create a streamlined look, so that you can enjoy this pretty hue without interruption.Group with charcoal greys and off-whites to create a softly monochrome colour scheme in an office or bedroom. Or create a sense of calm in the hallway or landing to welcome you and the family home after a stressful day out and about!

products.title: Spectrum, Eagle - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, eagle - venetian blind you'll need to be eagle-eyed to catch this subtle colour, as the spectrum eagle was made to blend beautifully amongst stronger shades. The shiny gloss of this blind does catch the light though, as it filters through the ga
products.productdescription: You'll need to be eagle-eyed to catch this subtle colour, as the spectrum eagle was made to blend beautifully amongst stronger shades. The shiny gloss of this blind does catch the light though, as it filters through the gaps of your open eagle blind. When closed however, you can block the light out, so simply adjust according to your needs.Use in the hallway to add just a hint of colour amongst white walls, or settle amongst deeper, darker greys for a gentle monochrome look in the office or lounge.

products.title: Spectrum, Mercury - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, mercury - venetian blind a soft dove grey, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum mercury combines contemporary style with all the robustness that comes with the sturdy aluminium slats, which can be easily adjusted to let light in or keep it o
products.productdescription: A soft dove grey, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum mercury combines contemporary style with all the robustness that comes with the sturdy aluminium slats, which can be easily adjusted to let light in or keep it out. Create a light, discreet look in the living room by using the mercury to complement whites and even lighter greys. Or go for style and sophistication in the dining room, by pairing with a deep navy and dazzling whites to offset each other beautifully.

products.title: Spectrum, Moon Mist - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, moon mist - venetian blind the spectrum moon mist is the very definition of subtlety, with its pretty, creamy hue, accentuated by the matte satin finish. Slim aluminium slats can be gently raised, lowered, or tilted at ease, adding functionality
products.productdescription: The spectrum moon mist is the very definition of subtlety, with its pretty, creamy hue, accentuated by the matte satin finish. Slim aluminium slats can be gently raised, lowered, or tilted at ease, adding functionality to this already stylish blind.Craft a serene and soothing atmosphere in the nursery by placing the moon mist amongst soft off-whites and pale greens, with pretty checked patterns to match. Or use as part of a more vibrant colour scheme in the dining room, settling against a deep red or sky blue feature wall.

products.title: Spectrum, Akaroa - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, akaroa - venetian blind the akaroa blind from the spectrum range provides a creamy light brown, with a soft satin finish, that will complement so many shades in your home. High quality slats and fittings make this choice not only aesthetically p
products.productdescription: The akaroa blind from the spectrum range provides a creamy light brown, with a soft satin finish, that will complement so many shades in your home. High quality slats and fittings make this choice not only aesthetically pleasing, but practical as well. Coordinate the akaroa with deep chocolate hues and light, pretty creams for a kitchen colour scheme that might just leave you feeling a little hungry! Alternatively, use as a stand-alone feature in a contemporary dining room by setting against off-white walls and pale woods.

products.title: Spectrum, Cotton White - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, cotton white - venetian blind spectrum's cotton white comprises of off-white, gloss finish slats and matching fittings, including the pull-cords and rails. This is a colour for those who want the purity of white without the dazzling brightness o
products.productdescription: Spectrum's cotton white comprises of off-white, gloss finish slats and matching fittings, including the pull-cords and rails. This is a colour for those who want the purity of white without the dazzling brightness of it. Incorporate into an off-white, modern country kitchen to add a hint of contemporary utilitarianism to the mix. Accent with soft silvers and dove greys for a cool, fresh style, or with brushed golds and cappuccino beiges for a warm and welcoming colour theme that will make your guests never want to leave.

products.title: Spectrum, Grey Flannel - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, grey flannel - venetian blind the satin-finish grey of the spectrum grey flannel is about as industrial a hue as there is. The grey colour provides contemporary style and the aluminium slats give the blind a functional and lasting quality.
products.productdescription: The satin-finish grey of the spectrum grey flannel is about as industrial a hue as there is. The grey colour provides contemporary style and the aluminium slats give the blind a functional and lasting quality. If you prefer a neutral look in the bedroom, and like to fill it dove greys, whites, and taupes, then the grey flannel could be the blind for you. Or team it with lime greens and blacks for a truly modern atmosphere in your dining room or office.

Control the light in the room easily by using the pull-cords to adjust the position of the aluminium slats, moving and tilting them at will.The brushed azure will provide any window with a hushed metallic look so that bolder features in the room can take centre stage. Use with bold blues in an office or dining room that needs some contemporary style and appeal.

When closed, enjoy all the privacy and shelter of the dark, but when open, light will seep through in varying amounts, depending on your positioning of the slats.Pair with browns and golds for a luxurious feel in the living or dining room, or use as a standout statement feature in your bedroom, set against white walls. The carmela star can be styled to feel either vintage or contemporary - the choice is yours.

Crafted from durable, heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easy to tilt and move about, this is a blind that is built to last - in quality and style. Hang the gunmetal star in a contemporary dining room, accented by bright silvers, or use in a teenager's room for a fun and exciting shimmering window covering, sat amongst soft greys and dulled whites.

The heavy-duty aluminium slats can be adjusted to allow just the right amount of light into the room, all controlled by easy-to-use pull-cords. Pretty pink bedrooms with a light and romantic feel will benefit from the silver star, which will glisten beautifully amongst white walls and hushed rose hues. products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, porcelain grey fine grain - venetian blind there's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, wh
products.productdescription: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability.Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom. Depending on your tastes, accompany with bold florals or fun abstract patterning to add extra depth.

products.title: Vista, Squirrel Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Vista, squirrel grey - venetian blind the vista squirrel grey brings a light, industrial tone to any room, and with this blind, you can experience light and air whether it's opened or closed. Sturdy aluminium slats are home to perforated holes that let th
products.productdescription: The vista squirrel grey brings a light, industrial tone to any room, and with this blind, you can experience light and air whether it's opened or closed. Sturdy aluminium slats are home to perforated holes that let the light flow through whether opened or closed.For a cool, utilitarian look in the kitchen, team the squirrel grey with white tiles and silver accent colours. Or use in the home office for a fresh and airy feel that will soon have you knuckling down to some work.

products.title: Vista, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Vista, brushed silver - venetian blind the vista venetian blind in brushed silver combines sturdy pragmatism with a muted, industrial silver, with perforated holes allowing light to gently filter through. The blind is made from heavy gauge aluminium, maki
products.productdescription: The vista venetian blind in brushed silver combines sturdy pragmatism with a muted, industrial silver, with perforated holes allowing light to gently filter through. The blind is made from heavy gauge aluminium, making it durable and hardwearing. Team the brushed silver with dark burgundy for a moody, contemporary feel in a modern living room, or use in the hallway or landing to add depth and texture to a fairly neutral area. Wherever it's placed, it will certainly be a talking point!

products.title: Vista, Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Vista, magnolia - venetian blind the barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none o
products.productdescription: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through.Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers. Or add some funk to your utility room or downstairs cloakroom, without overpowering the room with colour.

products.title: Vista, Black - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Vista, black - venetian blind the vista in black unites a jet black shade with finely perforated aluminium slats, creating a uniquely stylish, satin-finish veneer that lets the light filter through even when closed. To add more light to the room, simply u
products.productdescription: The vista in black unites a jet black shade with finely perforated aluminium slats, creating a uniquely stylish, satin-finish veneer that lets the light filter through even when closed. To add more light to the room, simply use the pull-cords to tilt or open the slats.Black, of course, matches most shades, and the black will look particularly striking against bold or pastel colours, such as citrus oranges and vibrant reds, or baby blues and pretty pale pinks. Use with a bright aqua for a contemporary bedroom style for a teenager, or with stark whites for a monochrome office space.

products.productdescription: The wow factor range is one for anyone who loves sheen and texture around their home, and the river bed crackle offers this in bucketloads, as well as clean, sturdy functionality in the form of hardwearing aluminium slats.Think deep greys, pure whites, and shiny silvers for a monochrome feel in your dining room or home office, all led stylishly by the river bed crackle. Or use in a magnolia utility room to add style and texture to an often forgotten room.

products.title: Wood Effect, Natural - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Wood effect, natural - venetian blind the natural is the lightest of their wood effect range, and will match almost any colour scheme. It combines a classically light wood effect with the sturdy toughness of heavy gauge aluminium, resulting in a modern and
products.productdescription: The natural is the lightest of their wood effect range, and will match almost any colour scheme. It combines a classically light wood effect with the sturdy toughness of heavy gauge aluminium, resulting in a modern and stylish look.The unobtrusive wood-look of the natural will match almost any colour palette. Use amongst pastels in a light and airy dining room; with forest greens in a statement dining room; or with fuchsia pinks in a teenager's bedroom. And because of this easily mixed wood shade, you won't need to change your blind every time you change your wall colour!

products.title: Wow Factor, Powder Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Wow factor, powder crackle - venetian blind the wow factor in powder crackle unites a shiny, crackled effect with the functionality of heavy duty aluminium slats, making it the ideal option for wipe-clean usability. Use for both privacy and light control
products.productdescription: The wow factor in powder crackle unites a shiny, crackled effect with the functionality of heavy duty aluminium slats, making it the ideal option for wipe-clean usability. Use for both privacy and light control purposes, using the adjustable slats to open and close.For a hint of pale grey in the bathroom, combine the powder crackle with blues and whites, as well as silver accents in the form of fixtures and fittings. You could even use the powder crackle as part of a monochrome colour palette in a teenager's room for a touch of contemporary style.

products.title: Wood Effect, Pecan - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Wood effect, pecan - venetian blind the beautiful vibrancy of the wood effect pecan works to create a fresh and natural venetian blind. The easy, wipe-clean slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, making them both usable and long-lasting.Use
products.productdescription: The beautiful vibrancy of the wood effect pecan works to create a fresh and natural venetian blind. The easy, wipe-clean slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, making them both usable and long-lasting.Use the pecan in the home office for an attractive and professional finish, and complement with real walnut woods and soft cream walls. Alternatively, try using a similar colour scheme in the living room, where a soothing, calm feel is crucial for resting and relaxing in peace.

products.title: Wood Effect, Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Wood effect, walnut - venetian blind the wood effect walnut is a traditional wood-look brown, formed into slim, tilting slats that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. The heavy gauge aluminium slats provide quality and durability, so you can rest
products.productdescription: The wood effect walnut is a traditional wood-look brown, formed into slim, tilting slats that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. The heavy gauge aluminium slats provide quality and durability, so you can rest easy knowing that this blind will stand the test of time. Pair the walnut with matching woods, soft creams, and chocolate browns for a luxurious yet functional feel in the living room or dining room. Or team with soft country greens and sunny yellows in the kitchen, where nature and cheer can come together.

products.title: Wood Effect, Colonial Maple - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Wood effect, colonial maple - venetian blind the modern, chic colonial maple from the wood effect range combines a satin-finish wood effect with hardy aluminium slats, resulting in a natural yet standout window covering that you'll wish you began using lo
products.productdescription: The modern, chic colonial maple from the wood effect range combines a satin-finish wood effect with hardy aluminium slats, resulting in a natural yet standout window covering that you'll wish you began using long before now.Cook in natural style with the colonial maple creating a contemporary, country vibe in a light and airy kitchen, where it can be gently accented by avocado greens, dusk pinks, or muted sky blues, making for a cosy but light dcor scheme you won't be able to resist.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect fit ash wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating greyheadrail and asilver bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content! Go for glossy silver fittings for a contemporary feel.

Include a feature colour of gentle sage or muted sky blue to enhance the country style.

products.title: Cotswold, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, ebony - venetian blind cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain
products.productdescription: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, smoke grey - venetian blind with the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of tim
products.productdescription: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance.Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls. Choose light wood furniture to add an extra dimension to the scheme, and accessorise with matching greys and yellows.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold, oyster - venetian blind bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the
products.productdescription: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail.For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws. Add gold or copper tones as a finishing touch.

products.title: Kalmar, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar, barkley - venetian blind kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and re
products.productdescription: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar, cool grey - venetian blind kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony
products.productdescription: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey. This will allow you to make a feature of functionality in a space where it can be hard to get the balance right.

products.title: Kalmar, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar, iron mountain - venetian blind kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you w
products.productdescription: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider. Add some darker accessories like a set of slate coasters and a dark grey lampshade and you'll be all set.

products.title: Kalmar, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar, windrift - venetian blind kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowin
products.productdescription: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for. Add a few jars of tea-lights with hessian bows to your centrepiece and you'll be able to create a beautiful modern meets rustic theme in a single afternoon.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, pearl river - venetian blind the pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of t
products.productdescription: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look.Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, jacobean oak - venetian blind dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coor
products.productdescription: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic.Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall. Paint the remainder of the walls in a homely cream and accent the room with pops of pale sage or apple green. Your room will feel gorgeously cosy, perfect for curling up on the sofa!

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, spanish cedar - venetian blind light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detail
products.productdescription: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping.Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout. Add shabby chic accessories, such as painted wicker hearts and rustic trinkets, to finish the look.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, ridgeback - venetian blind when you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for
products.productdescription: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone. Add in some dark brown wicker furniture and you're all set!

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, slate - venetian blind kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate wit
products.productdescription: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade. That way you can reinterpret your decor without overpowering what you already have.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Cotswold deluxe, oatmeal - venetian blind right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components a
products.productdescription: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats.Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space. Include chalky paints, bare woods, and natural materials, such as hessians, wickers, and wools.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose.Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, iron mountain - venetian blind turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to wel
products.productdescription: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites. Ideal if you want to introduce contrast without overpowering the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, cool grey - venetian blind with kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the moo
products.productdescription: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance. With a matching rug contrasted against a light beige carpet and cream walls you'll be able to get things just how you want them.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, windrift - venetian blind windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened
products.productdescription: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art. What you choose is up to you, but with windrift hanging in your window you'll be able to strike the right balance between colour and shade.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kalmar deluxe, barkley - venetian blind as your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instea
products.productdescription: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.productdescription: When you love the finer things in life you'll know that they don't come much finer than their deluxe version of cotswold ebony. Transforming the master bedroom with a little help from cotswold ebony is all about not letting this dominant shade overpower things. Keep the walls neutral and the floor light - it's only the accessories that you should coordinate with ebony if you want to strike the right balance.

products.productdescription: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish.For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white! Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in. Add splashes of colour with the occasional wall painting or plant.

products.productdescription: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation.Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls. Add polished woods and plush fabrics, such as chenilles and fleeces, using gold as a subtle trim.

products.productdescription: A brilliant white shade, the pure white 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that modern look, and sit well against any anthraciteupvc window or door. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses acolour co-ordinating white headrail and a colour co-ordinating white bottom bar.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope, clementine high gloss - venetian blind clementine allows you to bring the natural warmth and energy of the summer sun into your home no matter the time of year. A calming and uplifting colour that partners perfectly with the premium gloss fi
products.productdescription: Clementine allows you to bring the natural warmth and energy of the summer sun into your home no matter the time of year. A calming and uplifting colour that partners perfectly with the premium gloss finish is the secret to a venetian blind that will energise your home and put you in a great mood for the rest of the day. Combine clementine with a selection of pale yellows to give your room a summery feeling that makes you feel like getting creative in the kitchen. A light blue checked table cloth will also add to the uplifting atmosphere we all seek in the most creative room in the house.

The high gloss finish shimmers in the light as you create a focal point that will attract the eye all day long. For a room that fills you with energy and puts a smile on your face partner magenta with little touches of other electric colours so that you can truly bring your home to life. products.productdescription: Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill. Get creative and you will be amazed at how easily lime allows you to bring it to life.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: Plum is the perfect deep relaxing colour for those looking to get away from it all once they get home. The soothing character of plum works in harmony with the high gloss finish to provide a crisp and clean aesthetic which allows you to make a feature of window spaces like never before. Add in blacks and whites to celebrate the extremes of the colour spectrum as your touch of plum sits handsomely in the middle taking pride of place as the focal point of your room.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope, scarlet high gloss - venetian blind an enticing shade of red awaits every owner of this tried and trusted member of the kaleidoscope range. The high gloss finish gently shimmers in the light as the finely shaped wood takes pride of place in
products.productdescription: An enticing shade of red awaits every owner of this tried and trusted member of the kaleidoscope range. The high gloss finish gently shimmers in the light as the finely shaped wood takes pride of place in your home as it provides that modern reinterpretation of a timeless style. Scarlet allows you to be bold with your colour choices and let the gentle tones and colours in your room take a step back as you create a focal point. For that pure injection of energy and vitality add in a few electric blue wooden pieces to give your room some modern flavour.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Kaleidoscope, carmen high gloss - venetian blind light blues have a certain charm that other colours simply cannot match. They energise a room and allow you to weave otherwise contrasting colours into a coherent whole. Carmen takes the authentic touch of
products.productdescription: Light blues have a certain charm that other colours simply cannot match. They energise a room and allow you to weave otherwise contrasting colours into a coherent whole. Carmen takes the authentic touch of an inspiring blue and combines it with unrivalled craftsmanship and a spotless high gloss finish that gently shimmers in the light. Match carmen with some light beiges and sandy browns to evoke memories of time spent resting and relaxing along the coast. You could even add a retro glass full of sand and pebbles on the window sill to really embrace your new theme.
